They will then fly through [[Enkanomiya]], searching for a new place to live, grow, and multiply.<br />They were once destroyers of the old order, only capable of living while concealed in the [[Dark Sea]].<br />And there they would have stayed, had the serpent god not given them another opportunity.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Coral Butterfly''' is a type of creature that can be located throughout the map of [[Three Realms Gateway Offering]]. When captured, it replenishes the [[Bokuso Box]]' energy and gives 1 [[Crystal Core]]. It can also be captured via the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]] to be an outdoor pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Crystal Core|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
